title: Curse of the Promos (How Does Riot Do It?)
body:
Without fail, whenever I get to promos, I get the absolute worst teams.  Without fail.  I win 5 games in a row to get to promos and then bam!  A bottom and mid lane that feeds incisively.

What is Riots algorithm and why do they torture us!?

http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/summoner/na/46336987/recent-games
